name: Lost Space (Prototype)
description:
LOST SPACE - (Prototype)

Lost Space is a simulation and management game based on colonizing an alien solar system currently in early development. The game will feature mining asteroids for resources, colonizing planets, managing space stations for food and oxygen, sending space probes, and overall building a sustainable civilization in this new solar system.

The goal is for each new instance of the game to be procedurally generated in terms of planets, resource allocation, asteroids and asteroid belt, comets, and a lot more for an engaging and interesting gaming experience on each play.

This current version is very early in development and is just a simple prototype, the actual game will only build on this prototype and enhance the good things and fix the bad.

If this concept interests you, please consider donating any amount you may think appropriate to be able to continue development of Lost Space.

For more information about this game and its process in development, visit the devblog: www.sotocodes.com/DevBlog
